author: Simon Difford
description: Originally named "Lychee & Blackcurrant Martini", this is a cocktail of its time - perhaps now best forgotten.  Gin-forward with fruity notes of lychee and blackcurrant.
name: Lychee & Blackcurrant Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
